scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Loan Application Scoring System
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive applicant data from a loan application scoring model deployed by a consumer bank.  The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer applicant income, credit history, and other private information from the model's output (loan approval/rejection and associated scores). This data is then potentially used for identity theft or fraud.
initial_goal: Determine the income and credit score of applicants whose loan applications were either approved or denied.
